countries.title: United Kingdom
countries.text: The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, commonly known as the United Kingdom(UK) or Britain, is a sovereign state in Europe.

countries.title: France
countries.text: France, officially the French Republic, is a unitary sovereign state comprising territory in western Europe and several overseas regions and territories.

countries.title: Spain
countries.text: Spain, officially the Kingdom of Spain, is a sovereign state located on the Iberian Peninsula in southwestern Europe.

countries.title: Germany
countries.text: Germany, officially the Federal Republic of Germany, is a federal parliamentary republic in western - central Europe.
